tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Regulatory_Submissions (
    submission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    submission_name VARCHAR(255),
    submission_date DATE,
    health_authority VARCHAR(50),
    regulatory_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE submission_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    submission_id INT,
    document_name VARCHAR(50),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_content TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES regulatory_submissions(submission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_submissions(
  submission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_type VARCHAR(50),
  submission_date DATE,
  health_authority VARCHAR(100),
  submission_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE submission_documents(
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_id INT,
  document_name VARCHAR(100),
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_path TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES regulatory_submissions(submission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE submission_reviewers(
  reviewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_id INT,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(100),
  reviewer_role VARCHAR(50),
  reviewer_comments TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES regulatory_submissions(submission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE submissions_follow_ups(
  follow_up_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_id INT,
  follow_up_date DATE,
  follow_up_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES regulatory_submissions(submission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE submission_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    submission_id INT,
    document_name TEXT,
    document_type TEXT,
    document_content BYTEA,
    FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES regulatory_submissions(submission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE submission_review_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    submission_id INT,
    reviewer_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES regulatory_submissions(submission_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (reviewer_id) REFERENCES submission_reviewers(reviewer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE submission_approvals (
    approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    submission_id INT,
    approval_status TEXT,
    approval_date DATE,
    approved_by TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES regulatory_submissions(submission_id)
);
